r2b.apps.base

Class BaseFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • r2b.apps.base.BaseFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, ClickableFragment
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseAbsListFragment

    public abstract class BaseFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
implements ClickableFragment
    wrapper for the main functionality of the fragment.
